headline: Aflac (NYSE:AFL) Expands Empathy Partnership Offering Free Digital Legacy Planning Services
summary: Aflac (NYSE:AFL) is expanding its partnership with Empathy to provide the LifeVault service at no additional cost to certain group term life insurance certificate holders, effective July 1, 2025. During the past month, Aflac's share price moved by 3.8%, an increase that likely adds weight to broader market trends, as the Dow Jones Industrial Average and S&P 500 rose modestly amid other mixed stock activities. Aflac's recent partnership announcement and dividend declaration of $0.58 per share...
